daytime: Let us start the game.
School Intro
notes: You may now Save. Make use of multiple slots for backups!

daytime:
Castle Palace (First Trip)
TUTORIAL TIME:
-BASIC COMBAT
-SAFE ROOMS
Mona joins the party!
notes: Try to earn a little extra cash by fighting while in the palace.

daytime:
Class Question: ‘Villains.'
Knowledge +1
Castle Palace (Second Trip)
TUTORIAL TIME:
-AMBUSH
-GUNS
-ALL-OUT ATTACK
Skull joins the party!
Chariot Rank 1 (auto)
nighttime:
Check the cardboard box in your room for DLC items/Save bonus.
Sleep.
Fool Rank 1 (auto)
notes: Try to earn a little extra cash by fighting while in the Palace.

daytime: Kamoshida is a jerk
Kamoshida is a creep

>Kamoshida is going to pay for this.
>Castle Palace (Third Trip)
>TUTORIAL TIME:
-NEGOTIATION
-PERSONA CHANGE
>Panther joins the party!
> Lovers Rank 1 (auto)
>Magician Rank 1 (auto)
notes:
>Again, try to earn some extra
cash. Recruit some extra
Personas if you can (Pyro Jack
is good for the miniboss)
>Kill Shadows to get some
crafting materials:
(Raw Silk x2 for Lockpicks).
>Trophy – I am Thou... (auto)

daytime: Takemi Medical Clinic opens
notes:
Don't buy any medicine yet;
Save your cash for later

daytime:
>Shibuya becomes accessible.
>Airsoft Shop 'Untouchable' opens.
nighttime:
>Clean up the workbench to
unlock Crafting.
>Craft [Lockpick x1]
>Proficiency +2
notes:
>Prioritise armour over
weapons. Don’t spend all your
money now; you can always
come back later.

daytime:
>School Library: Grab [Pirate
Legend].
>Shibuya Underground Mall:
Buy [Bio Nutrients] (if needed).
>Yongen-Jaya Recycling Shop:
Buy [Tin Clasp x2] and [DVD Player].
>Spend time with Tae Takemi.
>Death Rank 1
>Guts +1
nighttime:
>In Leblanc: Crossword Puzzle.
>Knowledge +1
>Finish cleaning up your room.
>Get [Yoncha Walker] and
[Modern Thought] books.
notes:
>You are now free to spend
your time as you please.
>The first Rank of any
confidant never requires a
matching Persona.
>The Battle Bundle DLC will
give you x5 [Bio Nutrients].

daytime:
>Class Question: ‘Both are the same.'
>Knowledge +1
>Spend time with Ryuji Sakamoto.
>Chariot Rank 2
nighttime:
>Feed Houseplant in your room
using [Bio Nutrients].
>Kindness +2
>Craft [Lockpick x2]
>Proficiency +2
notes:
>You will need a matching
persona for future Chariot
Ranks, and all Confidants from
this point forward (with a few
exceptions).

daytime:
>Train: Read [Pirate Legend] (1/2).
>Secure Treasure Route in
Castle Palace
>Fool Rank 2 (upon entering Palace)
>ULTRA TUTORIAL TIME:
-FUSION
-QUICK TRAVEL
-THIEF ASSIST
-BATON PASS
-STEALTH
-THIRD EYE
-MAP
-NEGOTIATION (CONT.)
-SKILL ACCESSORIES
-GRAPPLING HOOK
-DISASTER SHADOWS
-WILL SEEDS
>Challenge Battles are now available
in the Velvet Room.
notes:
>Make sure to prepare before
entering the Metaverse; buy
equipment and supplies!
>You can buy SP-restoring
drinks from vending
machines. They’re a huge help
early on. The machines only
give two of each, but are
restocked every Monday.
>On Sundays or when it’s
raining, many shops will sell
special items, while some
activities will yield extra
points.
>Trophy - A Deadly Debut
(fuse a Persona)
>Trophy - Tactical Teamwork
(do a Baton Pass)
>Trophy -
You’d Better Hang On! (auto)
>Trophy - Talent Thief
(collect all three Will Seeds)
>Trophy - Let’s Blow It Up
(get a multi-kill with a
Disaster Shadow explosion)
>Trophy - Technician
(perform any Ailment combo)

daytime:
>School Library: Study.
>Knowledge +3 (Rain Bonus)
notes:
>Don’t forget to sell your loot
at the weapon shop!

daytime:
>Shibuya Subway Station: Examine
Job Magazines & apply for
convenience store job.
>Work a shift at the 777 Store.
>Charm +2
nighttime:
>You can now access Yongen-Jaya
during the night.
>Spend time with Sojiro Sakura
>Hierophant Rank 2
>Kindness +2
notes:
>Make sure you have Berith in
your stock!
>Get every order correct at
777 to earn more money.
>Trophy - Punch That Clock!
(auto)

daytime:
>Class Question: ‘All of them.'
>School Library: Study.
>Knowledge +1
>Guts +1
nighttime:
>In Leblanc: Brew Coffee.
>Get [Leblanc Coffee x1]
>Charm +1
>Hierophant Affinity +
notes:
>You can wash any ‘sooty’
equipment you find in the
Metaverse at the Yongen-Jaya
laundromat to get special
armour.

daytime:
>Shibuya Subway Station: Buy Aojiru
at Drink Stand.
>Charm +1
>Reach Charm Rank 2!
>Examine Job Magazines & apply for
flower shop job.
>Work a shift at the Rafflesia Store.
>Kindness +2
notes:
>Remember to drink the
Aojiru every Sunday for an
easy social stat point!
>Rank 2 Charm is required to
get the flower shop job. Get
every order correct to earn
more money. Look up a guide
to see which flowers do what.
>The Home Shopping
Network is on some Sundays.
You can order one of two
different item sets.

daytime:
>Train: Read [Pirate Legend] (2/2!).
>Guts +3
>Class Question: ‘Unquestioning
Support.' & ‘Duty to change it.'
>Charm +1
>Lovers Affinity +
>School Library: Return your book,
then take [The Alluring Dancer].
>Shibuya DVD Rental Shop: Pay the
fee, then rent [The X Folders].
>Work a shift at the Rafflesia Store:
Get every order correct!
>Kindness +3 (Order bonus)
>Reach Kindness Rank 2!
notes:
>Affinity increases further
with Pixie or Saki Mitama in
your stock.
>Every other shift at the
flower shop will give an extra
Kindness point if all your
orders are correct.

daytime:
>School Library: Study.
>Knowledge +1
>Guts +1
>Reach Guts Rank 2!

Class Question: ‘4 Colour Theorem.’
>Knowledge +1
>Send the Calling Card
nighttime:
>In Leblanc: Crossword Puzzle.
>Knowledge +1
>Craft some Thief Tools.
>Proficiency +2
notes:
>Make sure you’re ready for a
boss fight; buy supplies and
equipment BEFORE sending
out the card!

daytime: BOSS FIGHT: Steal the Treasure!!
nighttime:
>Magician Rank 2 (auto)
>Watch [The X Folders] on your tv
(2/2!).
>Guts +2

daytime:
Shibuya DVD Rental Shop: Return
your DVD and rent [Wraith].
>Spend time with Ryuji Sakamoto
>Chariot Rank 3
notes:
>Remember to bring
Agathion!

daytime:
>Train: Read [The Alluring Dancer]
(1/2).
>Class Question: ‘Wonder.', ‘Child.’ &
‘Prodigy.'
>Knowledge +1
>Shibuya Cinema: Watch
‘Tanktop Millionaire’.
>Guts +3
notes:
>Crafting may randomly result
in a critical success, doubling
the number of Tools made
and awarding an extra
Proficiency point. Chance of
critical success increases with
your Proficiency.

daytime:
>Shibuya Subway Station: Buy Aojiru
at Drink Stand.
>Proficiency +1
>Buy [Bio Nutrients] (if needed).
>Spend time with Tae Takemi.
>Death Rank 2
>Guts +1
notes:
>Rank 2 Guts is required for
the Death Confidant.
>The Home Shopping
Network is on.

daytime: >Kamoshida’s Change of Heart
nighttime:
>In Leblanc: Crossword Puzzle.
>Knowledge +1
>Sit and study.
>Knowledge +2
>Reach Knowledge Rank 2!
notes:
>Trophy -
Castle of Lust: Seized
(auto)

daytime: >Spend an entire day washing dishes.

>Learn that crime does, in fact, pay.
>Get a perfectly legal [Paper Bag].

>Waste your hard-earned money on
overpriced food.
>Meet a familiar face...
>Give your fancy thief club an official
name.
nighttime:
>Retain ¥6,000.
>Feed Houseplant in your room
using [Bio Nutrients].
>Kindness +2
>Watch [Wraith] on your tv
(2/2!).
>Kindness +2
>Fool Rank 3 (auto)
notes:
>Farewell, 24,000 yen...
Trophy - Phantom Thieves,
Assemble! (auto)
>You can now hold 8 different
Personas.

daytime:
>DODGE!! (Chance for Charm +2)
>Knowledge +1 (auto)
>Moon Rank 1 (auto)
>Shibuya Bookstore: Buy every
available book.
>DVD Rental Shop: Return your DVD
and rent [Bubbly Hills].
>Spend time with Ann
nighttime:
>You can now travel freely during
the night.
>Speak with Toranosuke Yoshida
in Shibuya Station Square.
>Shibuya Subway Station:
Examine Job Magazines & apply
for beef bowl restaurant job.
>Work a shift at Ore no Beko
Beef Bowl Shop.
>Proficiency +2
>Progress towards opening
Sun Confidant (1/3)
notes:
>Chance of dodging increases
with your Proficiency.
>Rank 2 Kindness is required
for the Lovers Confidant.
>Get every order correct
when working at the beef
bowl shop to earn more
money.
>If you go to the weapon shop
and talk to Iwai, he’ll let you
keep the [Riot Police E] gun
that was in the paper bag.

daytime:
>Class Question: ‘Fatal woman.'
>Mementos (First Trip)
>Complete Request:
-‘Beware the Clingy Ex-boyfriend!'
notes:
>Use this opportunity to grind
some more money or gather
new Personas.
>Trophy - One Step at a Time
(auto)

daytime: >Moon Rank 2 (auto)
nighttime:
>Shibuya Subway Station: Buy
Aojiru at Drink Stand.
>Guts +1
>Work a shift at Ore no Beko
Beef Bowl Shop:
Get every order correct!
>Proficiency +3 (Order bonus)
>Progress towards opening
Sun Confidant (2/3)
notes:
>The Moon Confidant
requires no matching
persona, and advances by
completing a certain number
of Mementos Requests. Once
that number has been
reached, spend time with
Mishima for a guaranteed
rank up.
>The Home Shopping
Network is on.

daytime:
>Receive Request:
‘The Bark and Bite of a Bully’
>Spend time with Tae Takemi.
>Death Rank 3
>Guts +1
nighttime:
>Text Message: Accept Ann’s
offer to study together.
>Knowledge +3
>Lovers Affinity +

daytime:
>Class Question: ‘Heian Period.'
>Spend time with Ann Takamaki.
>Lovers Rank 3
>Inokashira Park Hangout unlocked.
nighttime:
>In Leblanc: Crossword Puzzle.
>Knowledge +1
>Text Message: Accept Ryuji’s
offer to study together.
>Knowledge +3
>Chariot Affinity +
notes:
>Reminder: Bring a matching
Persona for your Confidants!
>Trophy - Tokyo Tourist
(auto)
